description:
Have you ever forgotten something really important for your trip?

This will never happen again with Pack The Bag!

No more incomplete hand-written packlists for your upcoming journey, no more bad feelings at the airport. Make your next trip the best trip ever.


Pack-The-Bag app for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad helps you managing your packlists. You and your bag will be well-prepared, you will save the trouble of thinking about all the items that you want to carry along on your journey.


- Choose from almost 650 baggage items in 26 categories
- Easily create new baggage items and categories
- Edit and extend provided categories
- Create new packlists by copying from existing lists
- Send packlists by email
- Dropbox support: Export and import packing lists via Dropbox
- Receive packlists from friends by email (import / export)
- Packing reminder push notification: Define a date when your device should remind you to start packing
- Sort lists by name or date or reoder them manually
- Duplicate a category (e.g. child 1, child2, …)
- Sort items in a packlist individually
- Displays how many items are not yet packed in a list
- Color schemes: Choose between green (default), purple, blue, red or white
- iPhone 5 and iOS6 support

Supported languages:
- English 
- German
releaseNotes:
- Fixed a bug that prevented moving some items from one category to another
- Bugfixes and stability improvements

Check out my new app Pack 'Pack The Bag Pro' - completely redesigned for iOS 7.
